channel.title: Guides on API Mocking and Testing | Microcks.io
channel.description: Recent content in Guides on API Mocking and Testing | Microcks.io

item.title: OpenAPI Mocking 101
item.description: Overview This guide is a step-by-step walkthrough on how to use OpenAPI specification to specify your mocks for your API.

item.title: Kafka, Avro & Schema Registry
item.description: Overview This guide is a walkthrough the different steps to have in mind when using Microcks for mocking and testing Avro encoding on top of Apache Kafka .

item.title: MQTT Mocking & Testing
item.description: Overview This guide is a walkthrough on how to use the Message Queuing Telemetry Transport (MQTT) protocol with Microcks.

item.title: RabbitMQ Mocking & Testing
item.description: Overview This guide is a walkthrough on how to use the RabbitMQ protocol with Microcks.

item.title: NATS Mocking & Testing
item.description: Overview This guide is a walkthrough on how to use a NATS protocol with Microcks.

item.title: Google Pub/Sub Mocking & Testing
item.description: Overview This guide is a walkthrough on how to use a Google Pub/Sub messaging service with Microcks.

item.title: Amazon SQS/SNS Mocking & Testing
item.description: This guide is a walkthrough on how to use a Amazon SQS and Amazon SNS messaging services with Microcks.
